title: HIV -- how to fight an epidemic of bad laws
description: There is an epidemic of HIV, and with it an epidemic of bad laws -- laws that effectively criminalize being HIV positive. At the TEDxSummit in Doha, TED Fellow Shereen El-Feki gives a forceful argument that these laws, based in stigma, are actually helping the disease spread.
author: Shereen El-Feki
keywords: TED, talks, AIDS, TEDx, global issues, health, law, HIV
